I believe it could greatly benefit you in your daily activities or projects. For this unique opportunity, I am offering it to you for $150. I trust that you will find its features and benefits well worth the investment. Looking forward to your positive response! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150.

(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
